data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I have been developing a perl interface for the Visualization
    Toolkit (VTK), an open-source 3D-graphics visualization package.
    (See http://public.kitware.com/VTK/ for info on VTK)

    I would like to use the Graphics::VTK namespace for this package.
    This has been discussed on comp.lang.perl.modules, with no
    objections, although I did get a suggestion about putting it in the
    root namespace (e.g. VTK namespace).

    I don't believe there is any existing perl interface to this 3-D
    package already on CPAN.

    Thanks,

    John
